author: yusaku
msg: AMBARI-1110. After clicking the deploy button on the Add Hosts wizard, the user is always taken to the Installer Wizard Step 8 upon login. (Arun Kandregula via yusaku)

author: yusaku
msg: AMBARI-1106. User-specified custom configs (such as hdfs-site.xml overrides) should be persisted to maintain what the user specified. (Jaimin Jetly via yusaku)
